price: Waan hin hojjanne haasa'uun keessan jibbaansi isaa Rabbiin biratti guddate.
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
